transcript:
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan Sachin ji good morning kaise hai aap?
Customer: Badhiya ji.
Executive: Ji Ashraf baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji bataiye.
Executive: Haan main keh raha tha kuch leads ka dikha aapko aapke account mein aane ka wo aapke generation wo sab plus hai.
Customer: Kuch shayad ekka dukka hi lead lead I think ek do hi lead hai na sir.
Executive: Kya sir?
Executive: Keh raha ek do lead shayad aapne consume kari hai abhi recently.
Customer: Haan sir ek do to kari thi lekin wohi hai na kuch bhi nahi tha.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai main ye keh raha tha isme sir star ke liye aap dekh sakte ho ek category ke liye apna agar chaho to jo aapka GI octagonal pole hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hai na usme kyuki sir dekho kya hai isme problem kya aa rahi hai isme customers jo matlab buyers aa rahe hain wo jyada jo hai directly suppliers se interact karke waha unki deal jyada ho ja ho pa rahi hai.
Executive: Jaise GI octagonal pole pe agar aap dekhoge to waise to leading supplier ke clients teen hai India page pe.
Executive: To kya ho raha hai jyadatar inquiry wo poles unhi ke paas generate ho rahi hai aur waha pe hi wo log business nikal le rahe hain wo wale suppliers.
Executive: To main ye to leader ke liye to main nahi kahunga leadering ke liye fir wo paisa bahut lag jayega aapka matlab 4 lakh ka investment ho jayega.
Executive: Wo lamba kaam ho jayega aapke liye.
Executive: To yaha pe jo minimum investment abhi aapko karni chahiye mere hisab se to wo aapko pehli baat to ye jo maximizer aapne liya hai na.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Isko isko convert karne ki zarurat hai MDC plus star mein.
Customer: Theek hai MDC matlab main aapko batata hun abhi ye jinke naam se chal raha hai na Mohit Jaiswal.
Executive: Mohit.
Customer: Jaiswal haan. Haan ye bhi aapko na ek ek ghante ke aas pass mein aapko call karenge maine unko number share kar diya hai aapko. Mera number sir mera number wo maine aapko diya tha 8076 wala whatsapp bhi kiya tha shayad.
Customer: Haan wohi dijiyega direct call kar lenge mujhe to owner wohi hai kya sir?
Customer: Haan owner wohi hai.
Executive: Theek hai haan to unko bata do kyuki kya fir wo time unka waste hoga usse achcha ki starting se kar lenge to.
Customer: Owner wo hai lekin isko handle main karunga.
Executive: Samajh gaya.
Customer: Hmm. To lekin wohi hai na ki ek baar maine unse kal baat kari thi to wo kal hi aaye hain wo bahar gaye hue the. Koi dikkat nahi hai sir haan. Haan to aaj wo aapko call karenge abhi thodi bahut der mein. Haan unka bhi words le le ki unka kya sochna hai. Kaise kya ab dekho unko mujhe na samjhana padega dikhana padega bhai visibility dikhani padegi kaise kya aa rahi hai. First of all sabse badi kya hai na ek to West Bengal mein apni visibility aa rahi hai wo kaam aapko uthana hai NCR region ka. To uske liye to star waise bhi karna padega aapko aur khas kar jo bhi category aap chah rahe ho na ki is product mein mujhe jo hai kaam nikalna hai to usme preferred star lena padega matlab India page pe.
Customer: Sir unko bolte hain sir aapse baat karne ke liye. Haan haan no problem aap boliye ek baar. Kal ko decision to unka hai. Theek hai sir okay thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states only one or two leads received.

- Wants to know about leads in his account.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested star category for GI octagonal pole.

- Executive suggested converting to MDC plus star.

- Executive will have Mohit Jaiswal call the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Mohit Jaiswal will call the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, subscription, star category, mdc
